Title: Prohibits property/casualty insurers from discrimination
Summary: Prohibits property/casualty insurers from discriminating based on race, color, creed, national origin, disability, age, marital status, sex, sexual orientation, education background or educational level attained, employment status or occupation, income level, consumer credit information or score, ownership or interest in real property, location, type of residence, including but not limited to single-family home, multi-family home, apartment, housing subsidized by state and/or federal programs, or any other residence type, or any indication of a consumer's price elasticity of demand.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to discrimination
